name: fromChunkQueue
signature: <A>(queue: Dequeue<Chunk<A>>, options?: { readonly shutdown?: boolean; }) => Stream<A, never, never>
description:
Creates a stream from a `Queue` of values.
*Options - `shutdown`: If `true`, the queue will be shutdown after the stream is evaluated (defaults to `false`)
documentation:
Creates a stream from a `Queue` of values.
*Options**

- `shutdown`: If `true`, the queue will be shutdown after the stream is evaluated (defaults to `false`)
